00041 int closeDialog(){
00042   TerminalApp::getSingleton().closeDialog();
00043   return 1;
00044 }
00045 
00046 int btn1Action(){
00047   InfoDialog* id= new InfoDialog( "A test of InfoDialog", 60, 10 );
00048   id->setMessage("This dialog is a test. It tests the caption::WORD_WRAPPED. If it seems to work, it can be good for some differents purpose. To correctly test this word wrapped text, it must be very long so I add text, and text...");
00049 
00050   PushButton* pb=new PushButton( "OK" );
00051   pb->setAction( &closeDialog );
00052   id->addButton( pb );
00053 
00054   TerminalApp::getSingleton().showDialog( id );
00055 }

00057 int item1Action(){
00058   TerminalApp::getSingleton().showMessage("Item1 has been called");
00059 
00060   Window* w=new Window("Server information");
00061 
00062   Label* l=new Label("Essai de label");
00063   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l, 0, 0, 10, 1 );
00064 
00065   LineEdit* l2=new LineEdit("lineedit");
00066   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l2, 0, 1, 20, 1 );
00067 
00068   ListBox * lb=new ListBox( "Listbox" );
00069   lb->addItem("Item1");
00070   lb->addItem("Item2");
00071   lb->addItem("Item3");
00072   lb->addItem("Item4");
00073   lb->addItem("Item5");
00074   lb->addItem("Item6");
00075   w->getLayout()->addWidget( lb, 0, 2, 15, 8 );
00076 
00077   LineEdit* l3=new LineEdit("lineedit2");
00078   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l3, 20, 0, 20, 1 );
00079 
00080   LineEdit* l4=new LineEdit("lineedit3");
00081   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l4, 20, 1, 20, 1 );
00082 
00083   LineEdit* l5=new LineEdit("lineedit4");
00084   w->getLayout()->addWidget( l5, 20, 2, 20, 1 );
00085 
00086   PushButton* pb=new PushButton( "Cancel" );
00087   pb->setAction( &btn1Action );
00088   w->getLayout()->addWidget( pb, 20, 3, 20, 1 );
00089 
00090   TerminalApp::getSingleton().addWindow(w, true);
00091 
00092   return 1;
00093 }
